node.title: 'Being treated like dirt': Health workers out of pocket up to $2k after COVID-19 payment delay
node.alt: The exterior sign of the Box Hill Hospital, underneath which a bush of white flowers blooms next to a concrete staircase.
node.description: A Melbourne hospital network has blamed an "administrative delay" for underpaying hundreds of staff who were promised an extra bonus worth up to $300 a week during the pandemic.
node.content:
["A Melbourne hospital network has blamed an \"administrative delay\" for underpaying hundreds of staff who were promised an extra bonus during the pandemic.", "Some workers at public health provider Eastern Health \u2014\u00a0including nurses in the Box Hill Hospital's COVID-19 ward \u2014\u00a0are owed about $2,000 in Hospital Surge Support Allowance payments.", "In mid-October, as COVID cases surged and hospitals were overwhelmed during Victoria's Delta outbreak, the state government introduced an additional $60 payment per shift for public hospital and Ambulance Victoria workers.", "The tax-free payments of up to $300 a week would have gone a long way, several Eastern Health workers told the ABC.", "They considered the bonuses a small reward for putting themselves at risk of catching COVID-19, and for working long shifts in full PPE.", "Several Eastern Health staff told the ABC they received a fortnight's worth of the allowance this week. However they were still owed about six weeks of allowance as back pay.", "\"You just don't feel as if you're being appreciated,\" one nurse said.", "\"We're putting ourselves in danger \u2026 hundreds of us haven't been paid [the allowance],\" said another.", "The nurses said the dangers of the job were highlighted this week with the death of an Eastern Health emergency department nurse, who contracted COVID-19.", "", "
Gillian \"Jill\" Dempsey died in the Box Hill Hospital intensive care unit on Sunday afternoon.(Supplied: Gofundme)
", "
Administrative delay to blame for late payments, Eastern Health says
", "In a statement, an Eastern Health spokesman said staff had received their regular salaries on time but there had been \"an administrative delay in paying the Hospital Surge Support Allowance\".", "\"This is being corrected with back pay being issued in the coming pay period,\" a spokesman said.", "Eastern Health did not answer questions about how many staff had been impacted across its network, which includes hospitals in Box Hill, Ringwood East, Upper Ferntree Gully\u00a0and Healesville.", "The Victorian secretary of the Australian Nursing and Midwifery Federation (ANMF), Lisa Fitzpatrick, said it was \"frustrating\" some hospitals had taken so long to pay the allowance.", "\"We cannot fathom why it has taken some health services more than seven weeks to implement the allowance payment,\" she said.", "\"The hospital support surge allowance is an important $255 million package [that] ANMF negotiated with the Andrews Government to ensure nurses and midwives \u2014 and others \u2014\u00a0caring for patients and performing other roles in health services on the pandemic frontline, do not feel taken for granted.\"", "The bonus payments are set to end in February.", "Many workers at private hospitals, who took on COVID-19 patients from the public system, have been upset that they have not received the allowance.", "The nurses union said it was lobbying the state government to provide the allowance for those private hospital staff, along with public aged care and mental health workers.", "The Victorian\u00a0government was contacted for comment."]
